item.description:
Pub night on a Saturday night! This has been a lot of fun the last couple of times so lets do it again!

We'll meet at the outdoor bar (all the way in the back.)
- a cool Tiki Bar environment!


We can make our way down to other bars if our group feels like a Pub crawl...

What better way to enjoy a summer night than having food & drinks with new friends?
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at outdoor bar area - all the way in the back.
item.name: Pub Night - Saturday Night - Salvation Cafe - Great Food/Great Drinks
